# isContainer

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether a media item is container of other items.

## Declaration

```swift
var isContainer: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the designated content item’s identified as being able to contain other content items. For example, an album is a container that holds multiple songs.

## Retrieving information about a media item

- **artwork**: A single image that’s associated with the media item.
- **isExplicitContent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item contains explicit content.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the media item.
- **isPlayable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a media item is able to be played.
- **isStreamingContent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the content item is streaming content.
- **playbackProgress**: The amount of content played for the media item.
- **subtitle**: A secondary designator for the media item.
- **title**: The public name of the media item.
